description:
A Mid-Villain has taken over Uzuki and attacks Yuki. Tsukumo saves him but is dealt a deadly blow. Facing the danger of death, Zess jumps in, but the Duras reveals what he is. Can a betrayer be trusted or will Yuki’s power finally awaken and protect them?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 帰らぬ日々 白き明日
